name: UIPickerViewAccessibilityDelegate
desc: A set of methods you can implement to provide accessibility information for individual components of a picker view.

items.name: func pickerView(UIPickerView, accessibilityLabelForComponent: Int) -> String?
items.desc: Returns a string that identifies the picker view component.

items.name: func pickerView(UIPickerView, accessibilityAttributedLabelForComponent: Int) -> NSAttributedString?
items.desc: Returns an attributed string that identifies the picker view component.

items.name: func pickerView(UIPickerView, accessibilityHintForComponent: Int) -> String?
items.desc: Returns a string that describes the result of performing an action on the component.

items.name: func pickerView(UIPickerView, accessibilityAttributedHintForComponent: Int) -> NSAttributedString?
items.desc: Returns an attributed string that describes the result of performing an action on the specified component.
